title: Personal:
text: Since 2012, i am a student at Polytech', the polytechnic school of the Université de Nice Sophia-Antipolis. I was born in Saint-Raphäel (Var, France) in 1994. Four years later I moved to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, where I lived for 16 years. Finally, in 2012, I came back to the French riviera to continue my higher studies.
